page.title: 14TRENT POLYTECHNIC CLIFTON
page.content: Since 1970{Trent Polytechnic}has been carrying out its role of providing a wide range of higher education courses. The Clifton site is in green belt land and houses the{School of {Education,Modern Studies and Science. As well as the academic it serves the sporting,cultural and social needs of the polytechnic community. In a semi-rural setting the campus features facilities for music,drama and sports of all kinds,Student Union buildings and social accomadation.A new{School of Science}building was occupied in September 1981 and houses the department of{Physical and Life {Sciences}in accomadation custom built. { Physics,Mathematics,Computing and {Teacher Traning}are housed in other buildings on campus.Also featured on site is residents for 400 students.
